channel.title: Quantum-Safe VPN on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Quantum-Safe VPN on FinanClub

item.title: FTNT
item.description: score:182 Chances: Fortinet, Inc. (FTNT) is collaborating with Arqit and BT to introduce a Quantum-Safe VPN to safeguard against evolving cyber threats. With the launch of Fortinet Advisor, a generative AI assistant, the company is harnessing more than a decade of AI innovation and deep threat expertise to empower customers with cutting-edge tools.
